p.e:
IN ORDER TO TRIGGER EFFECTS,
PLEASE DISABLE
"SMOOTH WALK MOTION"

1. TAP ON YOUR RING.

2. TAP ON "ME".

3. TAP ON THE "..." BUTTON, BOTTOM-LEFT.

4. TAP ON THE      AT THE BOTTOM.

5. UNCHECK "SMOOTH WALK MOTION".

6. TAP ON THE X AT THE TOP-RIGHT TO CLOSE
    YOUR MENU.



NOW WOULD YOU KINDLY TAKE A LANTERN HERE
AND ENJOY THE ISLAND...
